org.webcurator.domain
Interface InTrayDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
InTrayDAOImpl
public interface InTrayDAO

Persistence methods commonly used by the In-tray

Author:
bprice

getNotifications

Pagination getNotifications(java.lang.Long userOid,
                            int pageNum,
                            int pageSize)
gets all Notifications for the specified User.

Parameters:
userOid - the oid of the user to get the Notifications for
pageNum - the specified page of the results to return
Returns:
a Paginated set of Notification objects

load

java.lang.Object load(java.lang.Class clazz,
                      java.lang.Long oid)
loads a generic object, this could be a Notification or a Task object based on the objects oid

Parameters:
clazz - the Class of this object to load
oid - the oid of this object
Returns:
the loaded object, as an Object with no Casting applied

populateOwner

InTrayResource populateOwner(InTrayResource wctResource)
populates the Owner of the specified resource whether or not it is a User or Agency owned object

Parameters:
wctResource - the Resource to load the owning object on
Returns:
the populated resource with a populated owner

privs - a List of RolePrivileges

countTasks

int countTasks(java.lang.String messageType,
               InTrayResource wctResource)
Count the number of tasks of a given type associated with a particular resource. This can be used to ensure that we do not create two of the same tasks against a single object.

Parameters:
messageType - The type of the task.
wctResource - The intray resource the task is related to.
Returns:
The number of tasks.

deleteNotificationsByUser

void deleteNotificationsByUser(java.lang.Long userOid)
Deletes all notifications for the specified user.

Parameters:
userOid - The OID of the user.
